description: This CSS file contains styles for theming the application, defining variables for light and dark themes, and styling components such as the App header and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class with styling for text alignment, background color, and color transitions.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class for the application with styles for background color, display properties, and font sizing.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo class with styling to define the logo size and animation.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link class defining color and transition properties.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button class for toggling themes with styles for position, background color, and hover effects.
